mean_cn: n. 简历；  vi. 重新开始；又继续；  vt. 重新获得；恢复；重新开始
mean_en: a short written account of your education and your previous jobs that you send to an employer when you are looking for a job
word_etyma: re向后，回+sume拿，取→拿回去，也可解释为重新拿起，继续 → 拿回；恢复
sentence: I don't think he's qualified as his resume is informal.
sentence_trans: 我认为他不合格，因为他的简历太不正式了。
